Docs.summary: Provides a Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) implementation of the Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数使用默认<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyOpenOptions>值<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyOpenOptions.None>和<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider.MicrosoftSoftwareKeyStorageProvider%2A>作为默认密钥存储提供程序 (KSP) 来打开密钥。

Docs.exception: Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) is not supported on this system.

A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specify options for opening the key, such as where the key is opened from (machine or user storage) and whether to suppress UI prompting.

Docs.exception: Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) is not supported on this system.

Docs.summary: Creates a symmetric AES decryptor object with the current key and initialization vector ().

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法来创建使用的加密的消息解密<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AesCng.CreateEncryptor>重载具有相同签名。

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform CreateDecryptor (byte[] rgbKey, byte[] rgbIV);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform CreateDecryptor(unsigned int8[] rgbKey, unsigned int8[] rgbIV) cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreateDecryptor (rgbKey As Byte(), rgbIV As Byte()) As ICryptoTransform
public: override System::Security::Cryptography::ICryptoTransform ^ CreateDecryptor(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ rgbKey, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ rgbIV);
abstract member CreateDecryptor : byte[] * byte[] -> System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform override this.CreateDecryptor : byte[] * byte[] -> System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform

Docs.param: The secret key to use for the AES algorithm. The key size must be 128, 192, or 256 bits.
The initialization vector to use for the AES algorithm.
Docs.summary: Creates a symmetric AES decryptor object with the specified key and initialization vector (IV).

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此方法来创建使用的加密的消息解密<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AesCng.CreateEncryptor%28System.Byte%5B%5D%2CSystem.Byte%5B%5D%29>重载具有相同签名。
> [!NOTE] > 如果已创建<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AesCng>对象使用的现有保留的密钥以及你想要使用的密钥解密消息时，要设置<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.IV%2A>属性，然后调用的无参数<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AesCng.CreateDecryptor>重载改为; 否则为使用此方法将创建按指定的临时密钥`rgbKey`参数。

Docs.exception: is not a valid size for this algorithm. -or- size does not match the block size for this algorithm.
is a known weak key for this algorithm and cannot be used. -or- is .

Docs.summary: Creates an AES symmetric encryptor object.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform CreateEncryptor ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform CreateEncryptor() cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreateEncryptor () As ICryptoTransform
public: override System::Security::Cryptography::ICryptoTransform ^ CreateEncryptor();
abstract member CreateEncryptor : unit -> System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform override this.CreateEncryptor : unit -> System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform

Docs.summary: Creates a symmetric AES encryptor object using the current key and initialization vector ().

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于加密消息，然后使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AesCng.CreateDecryptor%2A>重载具有相同的签名来解密此方法的结果。

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform CreateEncryptor (byte[] rgbKey, byte[] rgbIV);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform CreateEncryptor(unsigned int8[] rgbKey, unsigned int8[] rgbIV) cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreateEncryptor (rgbKey As Byte(), rgbIV As Byte()) As ICryptoTransform
public: override System::Security::Cryptography::ICryptoTransform ^ CreateEncryptor(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ rgbKey, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ rgbIV);
abstract member CreateEncryptor : byte[] * byte[] -> System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform override this.CreateEncryptor : byte[] * byte[] -> System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform

Docs.param: The secret key to use for the AES algorithm. The key size must be 128, 192, or 256 bits.
The initialization vector to use for the AES algorithm.
Docs.summary: Creates a symmetric AES encryptor object with the specified key and initialization vector (IV).

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此方法用于加密消息，然后使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AesCng.CreateDecryptor%2A>重载具有相同的签名来解密此方法的结果。
> [!NOTE] > 如果已创建<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AesCng>对象使用的现有保留的密钥以及你想要使用的密钥加密消息时，你想要设置<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.IV%2A>属性，然后调用的无参数<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AesCng.CreateEncryptor>重载改为; 否则为使用此方法将创建按指定的临时密钥`rgbKey`参数。

Docs.exception: is not a valid size for this algorithm. -or- size does not match the block size for this algorithm.
is a known weak key for this algorithm and cannot be used. -or- is .

MemberSignature.Value: public override byte[] Key { get; set; }
.property instance unsigned int8[] Key
Public Overrides Property Key As Byte()
public: virtual property cli::array <System::Byte> ^ Key { cli::array <System::Byte> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ value); };
member this.Key : byte[] with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the key for the algorithm.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果已创建<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AesCng>对象使用读取的值时的现有保留的密钥，<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AesCng.Key%2A>属性，将会进行尝试导出密钥。 在此情况下，如果键不是可导出，<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>将引发。
除此之外，如果你设置的值<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AesCng.Key%2A>属性，将不再使用保存的密钥，并且将改为使用临时键。 如果你需要使用同样，持久化的密钥的新实例<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AesCng>类需要创建。

MemberSignature.Value: public override int KeySize { get; set; }
.property instance int32 KeySize
Public Overrides Property KeySize As Integer
public: virtual property int KeySize { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.KeySize : int with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the size, in bits, of the secret key used by the algorithm.
Docs.value: 算法所用密钥的大小（以位为单位）。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已创建<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AesCng>对象使用的现有持久保存密钥，并设置的值<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AesCng.KeySize%2A>属性，将不再使用保存的密钥，并且将改为使用一个暂时的密钥。 如果你需要使用同样，持久化的密钥的新实例<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AesCng>类需要创建。
